sceneDescription.title: The Old Sea Captain Arrives at the Inn

setting.location: Outside Admiral Benbow Inn, Devon coast, England

characters.appearance: Tall weathered man, 50s, scarred face, missing teeth
characters.clothing: Long blue sea coat, tricorn hat, high leather boots
characters.action: Dragging heavy sea chest behind him

characters.appearance: Boy, 13 years old, brown hair, curious expression
characters.clothing: Brown wool vest, white shirt, breeches
characters.action: Staring with wide eyes at the stranger

scene.mainElements: Inn entrance with wooden sign creaking in wind, muddy path leading from coastal road, mysterious sea captain with his chest arriving as first drops of rain fall
scene.details: Heavy brass-cornered sea chest leaving grooves in mud, captain's weathered hands gripping rope handle, boy's mixture of fear and fascination visible on face, lantern light spilling from inn doorway creating dramatic shadows
scene.background: Darkening sky over rough sea, distant sailing ship barely visible on horizon
scene.atmosphere: Ominous arrival, tension building with approaching storm, sense of adventure beginning

composition.cameraAngle: Low angle emphasizing captain's imposing presence
composition.focus: The captain's scarred face and the mysterious chest
composition.depth: Captain and chest dominating foreground, boy in doorway middle ground, stormy seascape in background
